name: vscplus
description: Additional customizable tools for Visual Studio Code.

vscplus.statusBar.reloadButton.enabled.description: Enable the reload workbench button in the status bar.

enumDescriptions: Aligns the button to the left side
Aligns the button to the right side
vscplus.statusBar.reloadButton.alignment.description: Specifies the reload button's alignment on the status bar.

vscplus.statusBar.textInfo.enabled.description: Enable the current file's text information in the status bar.

enumDescriptions: Aligns the info to the left side
Aligns the info to the right side
vscplus.statusBar.textInfo.alignment.description: Specifies the text information alignment on the status bar.

vscplus.statusBar.textInfo.displaySelect.description: Toggles whether or not it should display the number of selected lines and characters next to the total count in the status bar.

vscplus.statusBar.fileSize.enabled.description: Enable the current file's size information in the status bar.

enumDescriptions: Aligns the info to the left side
Aligns the info to the right side
vscplus.statusBar.fileSize.alignment.description: Specifies the current file's size information alignment on the status bar.

vscplus.statusBar.formatButton.enabled.description: Enable the format toggle button on the status bar.

enumDescriptions: Aligns the button to the left side
Aligns the button to the right side
vscplus.statusBar.formatButton.alignment.description: Specifies the format toggle button's alignment on the status bar.

vscplus.statusBar.formatButton.triggers.markdownDescription: Which formatting settings should the toggle change? Accepted items: `onPaste, onSave, onType`, anything else is ignored.

items.patternErrorMessage: Invalid item detected, valid items: onPaste, onSave, onType

vscplus.toolBar.wordWrapButton.enabled.description: Enable the word wrap toggle button in the tool bar.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
